title: Can't get alistar skin
body:
Guys I have a  question why can't I receive the alistar skin?
I already subscribe riot's youtube channel, liked one of the videos and coment.
The only thing that apperars is this message "There was an error accessing your youtube account. You may try the workaround suggested below."
 i went to youtube and subscribe, then i receive this message : "There was an error adding the Alistar skin to your account. Please try again later." if anyone know what's the problem pls help

replies.body:
Hey OneDarkHeart, 

There is a couple things you can do if you haven't received the skin yet. You can either submit a ticket, or you can tweet at @riotsupport. They should be able to get you the skin. 

New ticket: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new


{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
